item.title: Nvidia 的护城河里有一只深海巨鲸
item.description:
我们所熟知的主宰人工智能领域（和股票市场）的芯片制造商如今已被彻底颠覆。【原文：

The chipmaker that dominated the AI landscape (and stock market) as we knew it has now been deeply disrupted.

】

item.title: 印度小型股指数从 9 月高点暴跌 20
item.description: 周二，印度股市继续下挫，小型股指从 9 月份的最高点跌至 20%。【原文：A selloff in Indian stocks extended on Tuesday, with a gauge of smallcap shares taking its losses from a September peak to 20%.】

item.title: 本田瞄准全球摩托车市场 50% 的份额
item.description: 预计到 2030 年，全行业汽油和电动两轮摩托车的年销量将达到 6000 万辆，因此本田汽车公司希望占据全球摩托车市场的半壁江山。【原文：Honda Motor Co. is looking to capture half of the world’s market for motorcycles as industrywide sales of two-wheelers, both gas and electric, are tipped to reach 60 million units annually by 2030.】

item.title: 三位澳新银行信贷交易员将加入渣打银行
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）的一些高级信贷交易员即将离开这家澳大利亚贷款机构，转投渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc.）。【原文：Some senior ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. credit traders are departing the Australian lender to move to Standard Chartered Plc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: LNG WRAP：美国天然气生产商可能获得亚洲市场份额
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，从长远来看，美国天然气生产商可能会以牺牲澳大利亚出口商为代价获得亚洲市场份额，因为日本和韩国等对美贸易顺差国家会被迫购买更多美国液化天然气，以避免特朗普的关税。【原文：US gas producers could gain Asian market share at the expense of Australian exporters in the long run, as countries running a trade surplus with the US, like Japan and South Korea, are compelled to buy more American LNG to avoid Trump’s tariffs, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 押注 3000 亿美元人工智能的风险投资人称 DeepSeek 将推动人工智能产业发展
item.description:
硅谷投资者正在为科技行业的人工智能模式恐慌注入阳光色彩。【原文：

Silicon Valley investors are putting sunny spin on the tech industry’s AI model panic.

】

item.title: 石叶政府任命学者小田加入日本央行董事会
item.description: 石破茂首相的政府于 3 月底提名一位女性学者加入日本央行政策制定委员会。【原文：Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s government nominated a female academic to join the Bank of Japan’s policy setting board at the end of March.】

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼称赞 DeepSeek R1，并承诺 OpenAI 将提供更多服务
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）周一晚些时候在 X 上发表文章，对 DeepSeek 的 R1 模型首次亮相表示欢迎。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman welcomed the debut of DeepSeek’s R1 model in a post on X late on Monday.】

item.title: 全食超市工人支持工会挑战亚马逊
item.description: 费城全食超市（Whole Foods Market）的大多数工人投票赞成加入国际食品与商业工人联合会（United Food and Commercial Workers International）工会，为母公司亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：A majority of workers at a Whole Foods Market in Philadelphia voted in favor of joining the United Food and Commercial Workers International union, presenting a new foothold for organized labor within parent-company Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 瑞银即将与印度财富管理公司 360 One 达成协议以促进增长
item.description: 瑞士联合银行集团（UBS Group AG）正在与印度 360 One WAM 有限公司（360 One WAM Ltd. ）就一项交易进行深入谈判，该交易将使这家瑞士银行更快地进入印度蓬勃发展的财富市场。【原文：UBS Group AG is in advanced talks with India’s 360 One WAM Ltd. for a deal that will turbo-charge the Swiss bank’s exposure to the country’s booming wealth market.】

item.title: Glencore 印度尼西亚合资公司希望获得 10 亿美元与可持续发展挂钩的贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大宗商品贸易商嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）和印度尼西亚 PT Chandra Asri Pacific 公司的合资企业正在推销一项价值 10 亿美元、与可持续发展挂钩的银团贷款，因为与环境、社会和公司治理相关的融资在该地区的吸引力正在扩大。【原文：A joint venture between commodity trader Glencore Plc and Indonesia’s PT Chandra Asri Pacific is marketing a $1 billion sustainability-linked syndicated loan, according to people familiar with the matter, as the appeal of ESG-related financing expands in the region.】

item.title: 印度零售交易商坚持逢低买入策略
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 人工智能行业动荡引发比特币下跌，加密货币反弹蒙上阴影
item.description: 在中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 引发的全球市场动荡中，数字资产正遭受损失，这一抛售引发了人们对去年繁荣之后加密货币前景的质疑。【原文：Digital assets are nursing losses amid an upheaval in global markets sparked by Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek, a selloff that raises questions about the crypto outlook after last year’s boom.】

item.title: 印度债券有望在削减借贷的押注下进一步反弹
item.description: 由于预计印度政府将坚持其财政整顿路线，印度的市场净借款可能会连续第二年下降，这可能会延续该国债券的涨势。【原文：India’s net market borrowings will likely decline for a second straight year, possibly extending a rally in the nation’s bonds, as the government is expected to stick to its fiscal consolidation path.】

item.title: 印度房地产市场大幅下挫诱惑选股者
item.description: 印度房地产股票的急剧降温正促使一些投资者和分析师寻找机会，有选择性地购买股票。【原文：A dramatic cooling off in Indian real estate stocks is spurring some investors and analysts to hunt for chances to selectively buy shares.】

item.title: 日本反对党将阻止未达成更大税收协议的预算案
item.description: 日本首相石破茂（Shigeru Ishiba）的政府政策负责人表示，如果不向一个寻求更多免税额的小反对党让步，政府的年度预算将面临被否决的风险。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s government risks rejection of its annual budget if it doesn’t concede more ground to a small opposition party seeking a larger tax-free allowance, according to the party’s policy chief.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级养老金公司首席执行官表示 "欢迎 DeepSeek 带来的变革
item.description: 澳大利亚超级保险公司（AustralianSuper）负责人表示，人工智能模型的出现使英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：The emergence of a cheaper artificial-intelligence model that saw hundreds of billions of dollars wiped from Nvidia Corp.’s valuation is a welcome disruption to the tech sector, said the head of AustralianSuper.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对金属征收关税后，铜价扩大跌幅
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示计划对金属以及铝和钢征收进口关税后，铜价下跌，引发了人们对贸易战的担忧，并刺激美元进一步上涨。【原文：Copper declined after US President Donald Trump said he planned to impose import tariffs on the metal, as well as aluminum and steel, raising fears of trade wars and spurring further gains in the dollar.】

item.title: DeepSeek 施压人工智能领域，日本科技股延续跌势
item.description: 在中国人工智能模型 DeepSeek 发布引发美国科技股大跌后，包括英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）、测试仪供应商 Advantest 公司和芯片设备制造商 Disco 公司在内的日本半导体相关公司股价延续了周一的跌势。【原文：Shares of Japanese semiconductor-related companies, including Nvidia Corp. tester supplier Advantest Corp. and chip equipment maker Disco Corp., extended Monday’s drop after the release of Chinese AI model DeepSeek prompted a selloff in US tech stocks.】

item.title: 市场权衡特朗普最新关税威胁，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了唐纳德-特朗普总统最新的关税威胁，而全球科技股的下跌又给股市蒙上了一层阴影，黄金继续下跌。【原文：Gold held a decline as traders weighed President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats, while a cloud lingered over stock markets due to a global technology rout.】

item.title: 零售业带动澳大利亚 12 月商业形势好转
item.description: 在零售业的推动下，澳大利亚12月份的商业状况（衡量就业、销售和盈利能力）有所改善，消费者支出有所增长，而物价压力有所缓解。【原文：Australian business conditions — which measure jobs, sales and profitability — advanced in December, driven by the retail sector as consumer spending picked up while price pressures eased.】

item.title: DeepSeek 挑战每个人对人工智能成本的假设
item.description:
ChatGPT的竞争对手中国新贵表示，它的成本仅为ChatGPT的一小部分，这引发了人们对大量人工智能预算的合理性的质疑。【原文：

The Chinese upstart’s rival to ChatGPT says it comes at a fraction of the cost, raising questions about the rationale for stratospheric AI budgets.

】

item.title: 日本央行观察家认为下一次加息将在六个月后
item.description: 据彭博社调查的经济学家称，日本央行下一次加息可能要等到夏季。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to wait until the summer before it next raises interest rates, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 英国央行会议前英国食品价格创九个月最大涨幅
item.description: 2025 年初，英国食品价格以九个月来最快的速度攀升，这使得英国央行在下周的关键会议上需要应对的通胀威胁越来越多。【原文：UK food prices climbed at the fastest pace in nine months at the start of 2025, adding to a growing list of inflation threats for the Bank of England to grapple with at its crucial meeting next week.】

item.title: Rightmove 称伦敦房租上涨速度为 2021 年以来最慢
item.description: Rightmove 的数据显示，伦敦的房租通胀率降至三年来最低迷的水平，为英国首都的困难租户带来了一些安慰。【原文：London rent inflation cooled to the weakest in three years, bringing some relief to the UK capital’s hard-pressed tenants, according to Rightmove.】

item.title: 贝森特和特朗普重启普遍关税威胁，美元攀升
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和财政部长斯科特-贝森特发表关税言论后，美元对所有主要货币的汇率都走强，从而刺激了对美元的需求。【原文：The dollar strengthened against every major currency after comments on tariffs from US President Donald Trump and Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent bolstered demand for the greenback.】

item.title: 市场关注特朗普的关税威胁，石油保持跌势
item.description: 在本周开盘暴跌 2% 之后，石油价格企稳，交易商继续关注美国总统唐纳德-特朗普可能征收的关税，这可能会扰乱全球经济增长和贸易。【原文：Oil steadied — after slumping by 2% in the week’s opening session — as traders kept their focus on US President Donald Trump’s potential use of tariffs, which could roil global growth and trade.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的人工智能模型测试美国对英伟达芯片限制的极限
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 的强大人工智能软件表明，尽管美国试图遏制中国的科技发展，但其工程师仍建立了一个具有竞争力的模型，这让人们对华盛顿贸易限制措施的有效性产生了疑问。【原文：Powerful artificial intelligence software from Chinese startup DeepSeek indicates that its engineers built a competitive model despite US attempts to curtail China’s tech development, raising questions about the effectiveness of Washington’s trade curbs.】

item.title: 直径，Darsana 抢购了 10 亿美元 X 债务的主要份额
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Diameter Capital Partners 和 Darsana Capital Partners 等公司抢购了与埃隆-马斯克收购 X 有关的 10 亿美元债务中的一大部分。【原文：Diameter Capital Partners and Darsana Capital Partners were among firms that snapped up a major chunk of $1 billion of debt tied to Elon Musk’s buyout of X, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 贝森特获参议院批准出任美国财政部长
item.description: 美国参议院确认斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）为下一任财政部长，他将成为唐纳德-特朗普总统及其减税、放松管制和贸易再平衡等全面议程的首席经济发言人。【原文：The US Senate confirmed Scott Bessent as the next secretary of the Treasury, becoming the chief economic spokesman for President Donald Trump and his sweeping agenda of tax cuts, deregulation and trade rebalancing.】
